decks.notes: The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and removal spells. By utilizing powerful cards like Tyvar, Jubilant Brawler and Priest of Forgotten Gods, alongside efficient threats like Scrapheap Scrounger and Bloodsoaked Champion, the deck aims to apply pressure early and push through damage. With a mix of creature recursion, removal, and mana acceleration, the deck is designed to maintain a strong board presence and punish opponents for falling behind. The inclusion of cards like Insidious Roots and Kaervek, the Punisher further adds disruption and eliminates threats from the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of creatures and spells to gain life and create a strong board presence. Key cards like Wildgrowth Walker and Prosperous Innkeeper help gain life, while cards like Collected Company and Chord of Calling allow for easy creature tutoring. Aetherflux Reservoir serves as a win condition by dealing damage based on the amount of life gained. The deck also includes protection cards like Selfless Savior and disruption cards like Skyclave Apparition to help control the game. Overall, the goal is to create a resilient combo deck focused on gaining life and overwhelming opponents.

This deck focuses on disruption, removal, and card advantage to control the game and outlast the opponent. It includes spells like Fatal Push, Negate, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan, as well as cards like Drown in the Loch and Deadly Cover-Up to remove threats and maintain control. The deck also features card draw spells like Memory Deluge and Dig Through Time to generate long-term advantage. With a mix of counterspells, removal, and card advantage, this Dimir Control deck is geared towards controlling the pace of the game and grinding out a win.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively play Arclight Phoenix and utilize various spells like Consider, Fiery Impulse, and Lightning Axe to trigger its ability to return from the graveyard to the battlefield. The deck also includes cards like Picklock Prankster and Treasure Cruise to draw cards and maintain card advantage. Additionally, cards like Ashiok, Dream Render and Ledger Shredder help disrupt opponent's graveyard interactions. The deck aims to quickly establish board presence and overwhelm opponents with a combination of creatures and efficient spells.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing Rakdos creatures and removal spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The main strategy is to disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize, while steadily building up a board presence with creatures like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord provides additional utility and synergy with the vampire subtheme of the deck. Overall, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure on the opponent and force them to react, while also maintaining control over the board with removal spells.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of powerful angels and efficient creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. By using cards like Bishop of Wings and Resplendent Angel to generate tokens and gain life, while also benefiting from the synergy between Righteous Valkyrie and Youthful Valkyrie, the deck aims to create a wide board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent. Collected Company provides additional creature options, while Skyclave Apparition offers removal against troublesome permanents. Overall, the deck focuses on efficient creature beats and board presence to secure victory.

The deck focuses on flooding the board with low-cost, efficient creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes numerous aggressive white creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar, supported by anthems like Thalia's Lieutenant to boost their power. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Declaration in Stone to handle opposing threats. Mutavault and Castle Ardenvale provide additional creature tokens for extra pressure. Overall, the strategy revolves around building a wide board presence and maintaining pressure through aggressive attacks.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to use disruptive and resource-denial cards like Thoughtseize, Go Blank, and Sheoldred's Edict to disrupt the opponent's strategy while gaining value with cards like Waste Not and Castle Locthwain. Liliana of the Veil and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide powerful control elements, while cards like Reckoner Bankbuster and Hostile Investigator offer win conditions. Field of Ruin and Geier Reach Sanitarium help with land destruction and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through disruption and resource denial until it can establish a strong board presence and win the game.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving Amalia Benavides Aguirre, Collected Company, and Aetherflux Reservoir to generate a large amount of life gain and deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent in a single turn. The deck includes various creatures and spells to help set up the combo and protect key pieces, while also providing additional ways to gain life and search for important cards. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the combo pieces and ensure consistent gameplay.
